column4: I don't know virtual machines, all i've ever run is wine, if i were to use a virtual machine, would i be able to use Windows drivers for in this case my tvcard?
even if i had to then use a windows program to view the tv video
wildburn: thanks.   is there a way for me to use my dual-boot XP partition in a VM?
not really. The 'hadware' between the two is too different, XP will keep wanting to be reactvated.
